subject: College Athletics
Basketball (College)
Scholarships and Fellowships
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Computer and Video Games
lead_paragraph: Barring an appellate court overturning a federal judge’s ruling or granting a stay requested by the N.C.A.A., colleges can begin offering players money as soon as Saturday.
snippet: Barring an appellate court overturning a federal judge’s ruling or granting a stay requested by the N.C.A.A., colleges can begin offering players money as soon as Saturday.
